Detailed Description

Structures and functions for handling IPDR templates, as defined in Exporter/Templates.c.

Copyright (2005) Â© Amdocs, All Rights Reserved

This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND either expresses or implied.

Id
Templates.h,v 1.13 2005/01/30 15:41:26 guyg Exp

The file contains structures and function prototypes for managing templates and generating records according to specific templates.

Define Documentation

pointer to a function used to generate a record.

typedef struct IPDR_tag_Key Key
 

Internal key representation (identical to IPDR_Key, but with additional field).

typedef struct IPDR_tag_Region Region
 

A region of memory which needs to be copied (used for optimizing the number of copies).

typedef struct IPDR_tag_Template Template
 

Internal template representation.

IPDR_Status Template_IsModified (  Template *  Tmpl,
int  NumKeys,
const KeyBlock *  KB,
IPDR_BOOL *  IsModified
) 
 

Checks if a template is modified given a a KeyStateVector (a bit vector containing key states (enabled / disabled)

Parameters:
Tmpl template to check
NumKeys number of keys
KB array of key blocks containing updated attributes
IsModified true if the template is modified (output)
Returns:
IPDR_OK on success; IPDR_STATUS_RETURN_CODE otherwise. 
00123 {
00124     int i, j;
00125     unsigned long FieldID;
00126     unsigned int Enabled;
00127     Key *K;
00128 
00129     *IsModified = IPDR_FALSE;
00130 
00131     for (i = 0; i < NumKeys; i++) {
00132         Enabled = IsEnabled(&KB[i]);
00133         FieldID = IPDR_NTOHL(KB[i].FieldID);
00134         for (j = 0; j < Tmpl->Keys.Length; j++) {
00135             K = (Key *) Tmpl->Keys.Data[j];
00136             if (K->KeyID == FieldID) {
00137                 if (K->Enabled != Enabled) {
00138                     *IsModified = IPDR_TRUE;
00139                     return IPDR_OK;
00140                 }
00141                 break ;
00142             }
00143         }
00144     }
00145 
00146     return IPDR_OK;
00147 }
